name: Writer
description: Serialize the canvas to an external format. This is only a template/interface class. Inherit classes must implement the export format.

functions.name: marshal
functions.description:
Export the content to the implemented data format. Inherit class implements content specific writer.

Method signature has been changed from version 2.10.1 to version 3.0.0.
The parameter resultCallback is required and new. The method calls the callback instead of return the result.

parameters.name: resultCallback
parameters.description: the method to call on success. The first argument is the result object, the second the base64 content of a corresponding file

functions.name: formatXml
functions.description: utility method to format a given XML string.
